name: P89 Serial Programmer

screenshots.caption: p89pgm 0.2.0 running on Debian GNU/Linux 5.0 i386
p89pgm 0.2.0 (Cygwin) running on Microsoft Windows XP SP3

short_description:
p89pgm is a simple, command-line based serial In-System Programmer for Philips (NXP) P89V51RD2 microcontroller. This programmer was designed to be minimal, and have no external software dependency. Supported input format is Intel HEX file.

Apart from Unix and GNU/Linux platform, p89pgm also run on Microsoft Windows, thanks to Cygwin porting library.
summary: Program NXP P89V51RD2 from your favorite Unix system
